subject: Mail error
description_text:
Hello

I made you an order (number SSN5403), but the given email address doesn't
have the correct laulas74@free.fr. can you replace it with this one?
Laulas74@gmail.com

Sincerely

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Laurent Lasnier,  The changes have been made.

Thank you very much.

Le mar. 30 déc. 2025, 08:59, support@simsonn.com
Hi Laurent Lasnier,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
